verses.text: And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* from \w Naioth|strong="H5121"\w* in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, What have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? what \add is\add* mine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*? and what \add is\add* my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, that he \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, God \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w*; thou shalt not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: behold, my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* either \w great|strong="H1419"\w* or \w small|strong="H6996"\w*, but that he will \w shew|strong="H1540"\w* it me: and why should my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* from me? it \add is\add* not \add so\add*.\f + \fr 20.2 \ft shew…: Heb. uncover mine ear\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* moreover, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w certainly|strong="H3045"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* that I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*; and he \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, Let not \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* this, lest he be \w grieved|strong="H6087"\w*: but \w truly|strong="H0199"\w* \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, and \add as\add* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, \add there is\add* but a \w step|strong="H6587"\w* between me and \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Whatsoever thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w desireth|strong="H0559"\w*, I will even \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* for thee.\f + \fr 20.4 \ft Whatsoever…: or, Say what is thy mind and I will do, etc\f*\f + \fr 20.4 \ft desireth: Heb. speaketh, or, thinketh\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, Behold, to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* \add is\add* the new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w*, and I should not \w fail|strong="H3427"\w* to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* at \w meat|strong="H0398"\w*: but let me \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that I may \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* myself in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* unto the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \add day\add* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

If thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* at \w all|strong="H6485"\w* \w miss|strong="H6485"\w* me, then \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w earnestly|strong="H7592"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \add leave\add* of me that he might \w run|strong="H7323"\w* to \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w* his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: for \add there is\add* a \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* there for all the \w family|strong="H4940"\w*.\f + \fr 20.6 \ft sacrifice: or, feast\f*

If he \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thus, \add It is\add* \w well|strong="H2896"\w*; thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* shall have \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: but if he be \w very|strong="H2734"\w* \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w*, \add then\add* be \w sure|strong="H3045"\w* that \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* is \w determined|strong="H3615"\w* by him.

Therefore thou shalt \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindly|strong="H2617"\w* with thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; for thou hast \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* into a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with thee: notwithstanding, if there \w be|strong="H3426"\w* in me \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* me thyself; for why shouldest thou \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* me to thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*?

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Far be it from \w thee|strong="H2486"\w*: for if I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w certainly|strong="H3045"\w* that \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* were \w determined|strong="H3615"\w* by my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon thee, then would not I \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* it thee?

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, Who shall \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* me? or what \add if\add* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee \w roughly|strong="H7186"\w*?

¶ And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. And they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when I have \w sounded|strong="H2713"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* about to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* any \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \add or\add* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \add day\add*, and, behold, \add if there be\add* \w good|strong="H2895"\w* toward \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and I then \w send|strong="H7971"\w* not unto thee, and \w shew|strong="H1540"\w* it thee;\f + \fr 20.12 \ft sounded: Heb. searched\f*\f + \fr 20.12 \ft shew…: Heb. uncover thine ear\f*

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3541"\w* and much \w more|strong="H3254"\w* to \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*: but if it \w please|strong="H3190"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \add to do\add* thee \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, then I will \w shew|strong="H1540"\w* it thee, and send thee \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, that thou mayest \w go|strong="H1980"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be with thee, as he hath been with my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.  +  r 20.13  t shew…: Heb. uncover thine ear *

And thou shalt not only while \w yet|strong="H0518"\w* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* me the \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not:

But \add also\add* thou shalt not cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* thy \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* from my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: no, not when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* from the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

So \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \add a covenant\add* with the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \add saying\add*, Let the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* even \w require|strong="H1245"\w* \add it\add* at the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.\f + \fr 20.16 \ft made: Heb. cut\f*

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* caused \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*, because he \w loved|strong="H0160"\w* him: for he \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* him as he \w loved|strong="H0160"\w* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 20.17 \ft because…: or, by his love toward him\f*

Then \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* \add is\add* the new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w*: and thou shalt be \w missed|strong="H6485"\w*, because thy \w seat|strong="H4186"\w* will be \w empty|strong="H6485"\w*.\f + \fr 20.18 \ft empty: Heb. missed\f*

And \add when\add* thou hast stayed three \w days|strong="H8027"\w*, \add then\add* thou shalt go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w quickly|strong="H3966"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where thou didst \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* thyself \w when|strong="H3117"\w* the \w business|strong="H4639"\w* was \add in hand\add*, and shalt \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w Ezel|strong="H0237"\w*.\f + \fr 20.19 \ft quickly: or, diligently: Heb. greatly\f*\f + \fr 20.19 \ft when the…: Heb. in the day of the business\f*\f + \fr 20.19 \ft Ezel: or, that sheweth the way\f*

And I will \w shoot|strong="H3384"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* on the \w side|strong="H6654"\w* \add thereof\add*, as though I \w shot|strong="H7971"\w* at a \w mark|strong="H4307"\w*.

And, behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w lad|strong="H5288"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, find \w out|strong="H4672"\w* the \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*. If I \w expressly|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w lad|strong="H5288"\w*, Behold, the \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \add are\add* on this side of thee, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* them; then \w come|strong="H0935"\w* thou: for \add there is\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to thee, and no \w hurt|strong="H1697"\w*; \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*.\f + \fr 20.21 \ft no hurt: Heb. not any thing\f*

But if I \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thus unto the young \w man|strong="H5958"\w*, Behold, the \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \add are\add* \w beyond|strong="H1973"\w* thee; go thy \w way|strong="H3212"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath sent thee \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.

And \add as touching\add* the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* which thou and I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* of, behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add be\add* between thee and me \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* himself in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: and when the new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w* was come, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* sat him \w down|strong="H3427"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w meat|strong="H3899"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* upon his \w seat|strong="H4186"\w*, as at other \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, \add even\add* upon a \w seat|strong="H4186"\w* by the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*: and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* by \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, and \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* was \w empty|strong="H6485"\w*.

Nevertheless \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* not any \w thing|strong="H3972"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: for he \w thought|strong="H0559"\w*, Something hath \w befallen|strong="H4745"\w* him, he \add is\add* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*; surely he \add is\add* not \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.

And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, \add which was\add* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, that \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* was \w empty|strong="H6485"\w*: and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Wherefore \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* not the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* to \w meat|strong="H3899"\w*, neither \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w*, nor to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w earnestly|strong="H7592"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \add leave\add* of \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \add to go\add* to \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*:

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let me \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, I pray thee; for our \w family|strong="H4940"\w* hath a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; and my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, he hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me \add to be there:\add* and now, if I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, let me get \w away|strong="H4422"\w*, I pray thee, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*. Therefore he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* not unto the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

Then \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w perverse|strong="H5753"\w* \w rebellious|strong="H4780"\w* \add woman\add*, do not I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou hast \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* to thine own \w confusion|strong="H1322"\w*, and unto the \w confusion|strong="H1322"\w* of thy \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*?\f + \fr 20.30 \ft Thou…: or, Thou perverse rebel: Heb. Son of perverse rebellion\f*

For as long \w as|strong="H3117"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2425"\w* upon the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, thou shalt not be \w established|strong="H3559"\w*, nor thy \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*. Wherefore now \w send|strong="H7971"\w* and \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* him unto me, for he shall surely \w die|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 20.31 \ft shall…: Heb. is the son of death\f*

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Wherefore shall he be \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*? what hath he \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w cast|strong="H2904"\w* a \w javelin|strong="H2595"\w* at him to \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him: whereby \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that it was \w determined|strong="H3617"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

So \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* from the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* in \w fierce|strong="H2750"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* no \w meat|strong="H3899"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*: for he was \w grieved|strong="H6087"\w* for \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, because his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had done him \w shame|strong="H3637"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, that \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* at the time \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* with \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w lad|strong="H5288"\w* with him.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w lad|strong="H5288"\w*, \w Run|strong="H7323"\w*, find \w out|strong="H4672"\w* now the \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* which I \w shoot|strong="H3384"\w*. \add And\add* as the \w lad|strong="H5288"\w* \w ran|strong="H7323"\w*, he \w shot|strong="H3384"\w* an \w arrow|strong="H2678"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5674"\w* him.\f + \fr 20.36 \ft beyond…: Heb. to pass over him\f*

And when the \w lad|strong="H5288"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w arrow|strong="H2678"\w* which \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* had \w shot|strong="H3384"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w lad|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* not the \w arrow|strong="H2678"\w* \w beyond|strong="H1973"\w* thee?

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w lad|strong="H5288"\w*, Make \w speed|strong="H4120"\w*, \w haste|strong="H2363"\w*, \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* not. And \w Jonathan’s|strong="H3083"\w* \w lad|strong="H5288"\w* gathered \w up|strong="H3950"\w* the \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*.

But the \w lad|strong="H5288"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not any \w thing|strong="H3972"\w*: only \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*.

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* his \w artillery|strong="H3627"\w* unto his \w lad|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w carry|strong="H0935"\w* \add them\add* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 20.40 \ft artillery: Heb. instruments\f*\f + \fr 20.40 \ft his lad: Heb. the lad that was his\f*

¶ \add And\add* as soon as the \w lad|strong="H5288"\w* was \w gone|strong="H0935"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* out of \add a place\add* \w toward|strong="H0681"\w* the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on his \w face|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* himself \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*: and they \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* with \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, until \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w exceeded|strong="H1431"\w*.

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, forasmuch as we have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of us in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be between me and thee, and between my \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* and thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. And he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*: and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.  +  r 20.42  t forasmuch…: or, the \+nd LORD\+nd* be witness of that which etc *
